Entries.Phone_Marnie_Open: Hello? Oh, hi @! Yes, the ranch is open until 4:00 PM today. Hope to see you soon! *click*
Entries.Phone_Marnie_Open_Rare: Hah... Heyyy! Yup, I'm open right now. *bahhh*. That sound? Oh, it's one of my goats. Please come by if you need anything! *click* $4
Entries.Phone_Marnie_Closed: Hello, you've reached the ranch! Our business hours are from 9AM to 4PM. Please come visit me then. *beep*
Entries.Phone_Marnie_ClosedDay: Hello, you've reached the ranch. The shop is closed today. Sorry!

Entries.AnimalShop_MoneyBox: I'm visiting the island today. If you need to buy anything, just leave the money in this box!^     -Jas
Entries.AnimalShop_GoUpFront: Umm... @, don't you think you should buy from in *front* of the counter?$4
Entries.AnimalShop_NotTended: Come back when Jas is tending the shop.
